name: MDN

name: DevDocs
description: Search MDN comfortably. Even offline.

name: Simplified JavaScript Jargon – Glossary which explains all the buzzwords from the JavaScript eco system.

description: Explains terms used in functional programming in the JavaScript context.

name: Modern JavaScript Cheatsheet – Helps developers with basic knowledge to get familiar with modern codebases.
ECMAScript® Language Specification
description: The standard JavaScript is based on. Only for very advanced learners.

name: A re-introduction to JavaScript
description: Compact introduction covering types, variables, operators, control structures, functions and closures. *

name: JavaScript.info
description: A modern tutorial from the basics to advanced topics with simple, but detailed explanations.

name: Glossary of Modern JavaScript Concepts: Part 1
description: Learn the fundamentals of functional programming, reactive programming, and functional reactive programming in JavaScript.

name: Glossary of Modern JavaScript Concepts: Part 2
description: Explains concepts like scope and closures, data flow, change detection, components, compilation, tree shaking.

name: Robust Client-Side JavaScript
description: Guide focused on writing robust code by describing possible failures and explaining how to prevent them.

name: JavaScript Closures Demystified – Covering closures. From basics to use cases. Has useful comments.

description: Detailed explanation of the concept of hoisting in JavaScript.

name: Array operations
description: Covering the usefulness of Array’s map, reduce, and filter methods.

name: Promises
description: Learning promises step by step.

name: Async/Await
description: Tutorial showing the advantages of consuming Promises via async functions.

name: Pure functions
description: Answers the question »What is a Pure Function?« epicly.

name: Using Fetch – Describes thoroughly how to use the Fetch API to receive and send data.

description: Everything you need to know about the debugging tools built into Google Chrome.

name: Eloquent JavaScript – Covering the language and runtime specifics.
You Don't Know JS (book series) – Series of books diving deep into language.
Speaking JavaScript
description: In-depth guide beginning with the basics.

name: JavaScript Design Patterns
description: Classical and JavaScript specific design patterns.

name: JavaScript: The Good Parts – Classic material which still has relevance.
The Principles of Object-Oriented JavaScript – Comprehensible, especially interesting for people with a class based OOP background.
JavaScript Enlightenment
description: Will solidify your understanding of the language.

name: ②ality
description: Language features and APIs well explained by author and trainer Dr. Axel Rauschmayer.

name: Pony Foo
description: Detailed and high quality posts from Nicolás Bevacqua all related to JavaScript.
Basic talk about type coercion and strict type comparison.

name: FunFunFunction
description: Educational plus entertaining YouTube show covering language features as well as architectural topics amongst others.

name: What the heck is the event loop anyway?
description: Awesome talk about the way JavaScript works, and a tool for exploring the callstack.

name: Become a Javascript Console Power-User – Introduction to the browsers JavaScript console.
Debugging The Web
description: Learn state of the art in debugging using Chrome dev tools.

name: JavaScript 30
description: 30 video tutorials to build neat little things with just plain JavaScript.

name: Promises Are So Passé
description: Talk that shows where async goes next, why it matters, and what you need to do to put it into practice today.

name: Learning Functional Programming with JavaScript
description: Talk containing the best explanation of map/reduce.

name: Understand JavaScript's this Keyword in Depth
description: 18 minutes divided into 8 short videos to wrap you head around this.

name: Codeacademy
description: Fundamentals of JavaScript.

description: From Basics to Best Practices. Different courses related to JavaScript.
